frame.name: Rate_quantification
frame.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Event</fen> occurs that can be characterized by a given <fen>Rate</fen>. The <fen>Rate</fen> is a ratio of how much a particular quantity changes over time. <fen>Degree</fen> compares the the given <fen>Rate</fen> with a standard or expected rate for a similar <fen>Event</fen>. The Agent is a participant in the event who is responsible for the <fen>Rate</fen>. <ex></ex> <ex>We compared the <fex name="Event">evolutionary</fex> <t><fex name="Rate">rates</fex></t> <fex name="Entity">of the two different species of monkey</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Event">Graduation</fex> <t><fex name="Rate">rates</fex></t> have not gone up in the last decade.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Event
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Event</fen> that occurs at a certain Rate.
<ex><fex name="Event">Production</fex> <t>rates</t> have risen in the last year.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Rate
FE.definition: <def-root>How much a particular salient quantity involved in an <fen>Event</fen> changes over time. <ex>His heart <t><fex name="Rate">rate</fex></t> quickened.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any characterization of the <fen>Rate</fen> that is not covered by another more specific FE.
<ex>This camera is capable of shooting at <fex name="Descriptor">high</fex> <t>speeds</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition: <def-root>A participant in the <fen>Event</fen> who is responsible for the indicated <fen>Rate</fen>. <ex>The mating <t>rate</t> <fex name="Entity">of cats</fex> has dropped dramatically.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition:
<def-root>A name of the <fen>Rate</fen> of or description of the particular category the <fen>Rate</fen> belongs to.
<ex>His <fex name="Type">heart</fex> <t>rate</t> was unusually fast.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Degree</fen> compares the given rate for the standard or familiar rate for a given <fen>Event</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: rate.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: how much a given quantity changes with respect to another quantity
